all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Behold, this is my doctrine—whosoever repenteth and cometh unto me, the same is my church.
Doctrine and Covenants 10:67
Quote of the Day
"We can all contribute, no matter our age or our calling, to making our sacrament meetings the joy-filled, Christ-focused, welcoming hour they can be."
Patrick Kearon | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
